3: God makes sense of objective moral values in the world. If God does not
exist, then objective moral values do not exist. Many theists and atheists alike
concur on this point. For example, the late J. L. Mackie of Oxford University,
one of the most influential atheists of our time, admitted: “If . . . there are . . .
